title: Ascalypso w/ 101
description: This time we are featuring 101 (ten-Ichi) who is currently based in Nagoya for the first half of the show. He is well known in the Japanese bass music scene for his skillful turntable control and long time dedication for Drum & Bass and Jungle scene in Japan. I’m very excited to share his vinyl only mix showing the talents of the latest cutting edge bass music scene in the world. The second half is Ascalypso’s mix with various dub, bass and other mesmerizing tracks with a summer vibe! The last track is my favorite bossa-DnB. Enjoy! "
